title.narrative: Support to Civil Society Governance Funds

description.narrative: This activity (Support to Civil Society Governance Funds) is a component of Building Empowerment and Accountability in Malawi reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £13,098,869. This component benefits Malawi, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society. , with the following implementing partners: British Council, Coffey International Development, Crown Agents Bank. The start date is 23-02-2011 and the end date is 31-10-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
